page.title: 09 ******HEALTH*******
page.content: Willington and Findern are served by one doctors' surgery situated in Beech Avenue and a further Health Care Centre at Copper Beecheson the A5132- Twyford Road. The doctors' surgery is open for appointments between 9.15-10.15am.on weekdays. The doctors who hold surgery at Willington are: Dr.K.Robinson, Dr.B.Hands and Dr.Abrahams. At the Health Care Centre there is a chiropodist. On an average day each doctor will see approximately 50 patients at their surgery, in addition to any house calls they may make. If hospitalisation arises most patients attend either the Derbyshire Royal Infirmary or Burton-on-Trent General Hospital. The doctors have Auxilliary help in a visiting nurse to attend housebound residents.
